name: Mitchell Whitfield
info:
• 性别: 男
  • 生日: 1964-09-08
  • 出生地: Brooklyn, New York
detail: Mitchell Whitfield (born September 8, 1964) is an American actor and voice actor. He is known for his voice-over work in video games, movies and TV shows.
